Welcome to 12 Doors Escape Games - start a brain challenge!

Do you think you have the skills with 12 Doors Escape Games - start a brain challenge?

Escape Game: 12 Doors is another point and click door escape game. There are 3 floors with 12 doors. You need to exit from one floor to another. You don’t know which door is the right one to exit. You must find it out for yourself. Unlock to escape! Use clues to solve puzzles and to unlock the doors. Have fun!


Game features:

• Genuine story!
• Innovative puzzles!
• Stunning graphics!
• Realistic atmosphere!
• Tricky and challenging puzzles!
• Gorgeous graphics !
• No signup's required, just download and install!
